================================================
Module 5: Climate representation in CLEWs models
================================================

Learning objectives:
By the end of this session participants will be able to:
* Identify key trends, developments and concerns in climate science and policy
* Identify key issues and elements in developing NDCs 
* Understand the impact of climate variables on CLEWs systems
* Define emissions from energy, agriculture and land-use change
* Define carbon emission targets
* Define carbon prices
